sourcesContent:
function RoomInformationCard(props) { // Komponenten tar emot props. function handleChange(event, id) { // Skapar en funktion som tar emot ett event. props.chooseRooms(props.id, event.target.value); console.log(event.target.value); document.getElementsByClassName(`roomAmount`)[props.id].style.display = "block"; } return (
    • {props.rooms[0].roomName}
    • Room for {props.rooms[0].guests} guest(s)
    • {props.rooms[1].roomName}
    • Room for {props.rooms[1].guests} guests
    • {props.rooms[2].roomName}
    • Room for {props.rooms[2].guests} guests
) } export default RoomInformationCard; // Exporterar komponenten som "RoomInformationCard".
